cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.place

Class SparqlQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.place.SparqlQueryBuilder

  • public class SparqlQueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class responsible for populating a SPARQL template with required and optional parameters. It builds the naive SPARQL query - the only query required in the app.

      • limitToArea

        public void limitToArea(double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        double radius)
        Limit the area the query should be concerned with.
        Parameters:
        latitude -
        longitude -
        radius - Radius around the latlng from which elements will be included. The radius uses the same "units" as the latlng - it specifies "offset" of the coordinates.
